<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Focused Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=6026) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 124 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Monastic Archer Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5978)

**Requirements**
You are in Monastic Archer Stance.

</column>

---

You achieve a state of perfect calm before unleashing your attack, opening your mind to the minute movements of the world around you to increase your accuracy. Make a ranged weapon Strike against a target within your weapon's first range increment. This Strike ignores the target's [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) condition and all [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459).
